replies.body:
I've definitely toned down on the Minecraft playtime. I'm probably doing 1-2 hours per day on weekends, and almost no time on weekdays.

Which sounds like a good thing, but it's being replaced even more by TF2, MMOs, osu!, and League of Legends... so yeah.
